Headline: Forest Park- bound Blue Line Service Delayed
ShortDescription: Forest Park- bound Blue Line trains are standing at Forest Park due to animal on the tracks. Crews working to restore service

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park- bound Blue Line trains are standing at Forest Park due to animal on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
